title: Interpretation of a dream about a car according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of the new car. There are many interpretations of dreams in Ibn Shirin’s book, as he is a great and respected scholar and translator. Ibn Sirin is as follows: He said that when a dreamer sees a car in his dream, this explains progress in his life, because the car is a means of transportation. If the car he sees in the dream is new, this means that he will take a high position and have a high status and will change his circumstances for the better in an unnatural way. As a poor person who does not work also sees in his dream a new and expensive car, this indicates that this dreamer will get a lot of money, very good. Whereas if the student sees a very new car in his dreams, this indicates his success and at this stage a high score. Interpretation of a dream about a car For a married woman When a married woman sees a dream, whether it is strange or not, whether it is good or bad, it completely affects her husband’s life, such as: When she sees a new car in a dream, this indicates that she has given birth to a new baby. The wife’s life is full of happiness and pleasure and this child will be supportive For that coming period. As for the married man, he refers to him when he sees a new car: “I have blessed him with a baby,” as this becomes his support after he grows up and stands by him and is a reason for his pride, or it may indicate travel. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a married woman: Driving in a car targets different interpretations because it indicates walking and can To have a purpose or warning. Therefore, seeing a married woman driving a car is a strange dream that must be interpreted in a short time: If a married woman sees that she is driving a car in a dream, this indicates the comfort that she feels, as well as confirmation after a period of fatigue and effort. It can also indicate a sign that Something good will happen to her in the future, and if she is riding it unharmed and clean, then this is a sign that her life has changed from bad to much better. But if she sees a dirty and broken car in her dream, it explains: a miserable life and the worst that she will live with. But if she sees that she is riding The car with her husband and children and it collapsed with them, this indicates that problems and difficulties facing all family members. Likewise, if she saw during her sleep that she was riding in the car with her husband, then got out of it and put his son in his place, this means that the father will die and his son will take over responsibility in the house. Interpretation A dream about a car for single people: unmarried women, as well as a man who has never been married before, when they see a dream, they think that it could be the reason for their happiness or lack thereof, and sometimes it shows them stress, so it is necessary to know the interpretation of seeing a new car in a dream for them and it is As follows: Single When she sees a new car in her dream, it is interpreted that she will meet someone who loves her and loves her, and they will get married, and she will be very rich. Also, if she sees him driving a car, his strength of character, dominance, and determination in her opinion shine through. It also indicates her help to people and meeting their needs, and God bestowed blessings on him. On that day. Regarding a single person, when he sees something like this in his dream, this indicates marriage

title: The 8 most important interpretations of seeing a restaurant in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a restaurant in a dream? Evidence of a new job undertaken by the fortuneteller. What does it mean to see that he is buying a restaurant? Nutrition indicator. What is the interpretation of a girl who sees herself sitting inside a restaurant full of people? She says that she is a lonely girl. Interpretation of seeing a restaurant manager in a dream? Elements Of good luck and abundant livelihood. What is the interpretation of seeing an organized restaurant in a pregnant woman’s dream? Evidence of the fetus’s safety and freedom from diseases. Interpretation of a dream about a restaurant by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a famous restaurant in a dream with cheap food is evidence of the psychological comfort that the viewer enjoys. The restaurant could be in The dream is a sign of a new job that the dreamer gets, but he does not earn money from it. Then, seeing a person in a dream that he is in an ugly restaurant, this is evidence of the problems and fears that he will fall into. Seeing a person in a dream eating in a crowded restaurant, this is evidence of a lack of money and poor livelihood. Narrow. Anyone who dreams of buying a restaurant is a sign of abundant livelihood. Seeing a restaurant manager in a dream is a sign of good fortune and abundance of sustenance. A restaurant is a dream for single people. If a girl sees that she is sitting in a large and beautiful restaurant, this is an indication that she has heard the happy news. Then seeing a girl in Dreaming that she is sitting in a restaurant full of people, this indicates that she is a girl who feels lonely. If he dreams that he is eating in a restaurant and the food tastes delicious, then this is a sign of a new job that he will find. Then seeing the girl sitting in a restaurant and sharing food with a man, this is an indication of marriage soon. Interpretation of a dream about a restaurant for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that she owns a large and luxurious restaurant, this is evidence of the large amount of money she will receive. Then seeing a married woman preparing food inside the restaurant shows that she is satisfied and happy with her married life. Then seeing a married woman in a dream, Her husband works in a restaurant, and this is an indication that he is a person of good character and loyal to her. A dream restaurant for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream that she is inside a beautifully decorated restaurant serving delicious food is evidence of an easy and affordable birth. So seeing an organized restaurant in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of The fetus is safe and free of diseases. Interpretation of a dream about a restaurant for a man: Seeing a man working in a restaurant in a dream is an indication of his efforts to earn halal money and earn a living. Then, if a person sees in a dream that he was expelled from the restaurant, this is evidence that he will lose his good standing among people. Then, if Seeing dishes being washed in a restaurant is evidence of the end of the problems and turmoil that this dreamer is experiencing.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about water coming out of the breast for a woman married to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about water coming out of the breast for a married woman: Interpreters believe that the dream indicates goodness, but it has some bad connotations, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of seeing water coming out of the breast for a married woman, pregnant woman, and mother, according to Ibn. Sirin and prominent interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream of water coming out of a married woman’s breast by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of water coming out of a married woman’s breast? If a married woman sees water coming out of her chest in a dream, this means that God (Glory be to Him) will bless her in her life, and nourish her with what she does not expect. The dream symbolizes the dreamer’s feeling of satisfaction with her married life, her love for her husband and her devotion to him, but if water comes out of the breast in front of her husband, this means that she has some disagreements with him. In the current period, but this problem will end after a short time. If there is a person present with the woman in her dream, and he sees water coming out of her chest, and he knows it in reality, then this indicates that he is a magnifier, and he must beware of it, and if the woman is from seeing it. She had not given birth before, so the dream indicates that the Lord (Glory be to Him) will control her through pregnancy soon. Interpretation of a dream about water coming out of the breast for a married woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that the vision is good and shows the happy events that await the dreamer in the coming days, and if he goes through financial hardship, then The dream indicates that he will soon receive a lot of money unexpectedly. If a lot of water comes out of the breast in a dream, this symbolizes the dreamer entering a new phase of her life in which she feels happiness and bliss and forgets her sorrows and pain. If a married woman dreams that she was injured in the chest and it came out Water instead of blood, this indicates that she is a good person, maintains good morals and tries to raise her children. Why can't you find what you are looking for? Log in from Google, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site, and look at everything that interests you. The most important interpretations of the dream that water comes out of the breast for a married woman. Interpretation of the dream that water comes out of the left breast of a married woman. In the event that a married woman is pregnant, the dream indicates that her fetus is female and that she will soon give birth to a beautiful baby girl that will make her days happy. The dream symbolizes kindness, blessings, and the emergence of many positive changes. In the dreamer's life, this means that he will get a promotion at work and that his financial situation will improve soon. If the dreamer is a mother and sees water and milk coming out of her married daughter’s breast, then the vision indicates that her daughter’s pregnancy is approaching. Interpretation of a dream about water coming out of the left breast: Seeing water coming out of the left breast of an unmarried woman indicates that her marriage is approaching with a good man who fears God Almighty and will make her happy. And he cares about her. With some problems with her in-laws, the dream shows the end of disputes and the return of love and peace among family members, and is an indication that the Lord (Glory be to Him) will bless her with her children, and will grant them good luck and success. Excellence.Interpretation of a dream about water coming out of a married woman’s right breast. If the dreamer sees that dirty water is coming out of her right breast, then the vision symbolizes her money.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my husband in my family’s home in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my husband in my family’s house in a dream. Some may want to know the interpretation of a dream about my husband in my family’s house in a dream. It is one of the dreams that some people see, but there are many interpretations. The site explains, citing the interpretations of some working scholars who seek to reach the truth. Interpretation of a dream about my husband in my family’s house. In a dream: If one sees the husband in the family home in a dream, this may indicate good changes that will occur in the woman’s life during that period, and God knows best. Dreaming of the husband in the parents’ home in a dream may indicate changes in the events and joys that will come to him in those days. It may be Seeing the husband in the woman’s family home in a dream indicates the end of the disputes and problems that existed between them at that time. Seeing the husband sleeping in the wife’s family bed in a dream could indicate the strong trust that exists between them, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about an angry husband in a dream The dream may indicate The husband being angry with his wife in a dream indicates the intense love that exists between them at that moment. If the husband is angry with his wife in a dream, this may indicate mutual trust between the spouses during these days. A dream of a husband being angry with his wife in a dream may indicate psychological accumulation and tensions that Something happened between them and they need to seek help from God. Whoever saw in her dream that her husband was angry with her, it could indicate his great trust in her at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my friend’s wedding, who is flirting with me in a dream. If I see my friend’s husband flirting with me in a dream, then This indicates that this is stored in the false mind and that she must repent to God Almighty. Seeing a friend’s husband flirting with a woman in a dream may indicate goodness that will come her way during that period. It is possible that seeing a friend’s husband flirting with a woman in a dream indicates That the woman is very close to her friend during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream: My husband divorced me three times in a dream. If a woman sees that her husband has divorced her three times in a dream, this may indicate a trip that the husband may suddenly take in those days, and God knows best. Perhaps Seeing his wife divorced three times in a dream indicates some changes occurring between them, and this is an instinct, and God knows best. In the case of a dream about marriage, a woman’s divorce three times in a dream could indicate some changes occurring in her life in those days, and God knows best. It is possible that We see a husband divorcing his wife three times in a dream, this may indicate a financial crisis that they are suffering from and that they will be freed from it in the coming period, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a husband and not crying for him in a dream. In the event that one sees the death of a husband and does not cry for him in a dream, this may indicate The husband neglected his wife a lot during that period, and God knows best. If a woman sees that her husband is dying and she does not cry for him in the dream, this could be a warning sign that she is on the wrong path and that she should be very careful about the house at that time. .If one sees the death of Z

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about magic from Ibn Sirin’s relatives

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about magic from relatives: There is no doubt that magic is one of the false and corrupt acts forbidden by Sharia law, so all religions deny magic and sorcery and threaten the magician with severe punishment. In this article, we have collected all the clues and special cases of a dream about witchcraft from relatives in more detail and explanation.Interpretation of a dream about witchcraft from relativesThis vision expresses deception, hatred, constant strife, tricks, tricks, false actions, corruption of intentions and heart, turning to reprehensible actions, spreading discord, arrogance, tightness of the situation, and difficult circumstances. Whoever sees magic among his relatives, this indicates false talk, poor effort, falling into artificial chaos, a lot of gossip and oppression against the person, and exposure to a serious health disease. If the dreamer sees the place of magic, this indicates that he discovered the intentions of those around him and knew the secrets and events that were taking place. Behind him. If the magic is in bed, then it appears to him who is working to separate him from his wife, and who is seeking to mislead him and push him to seduction, and the man he knows may be suspected of wanting evil and hatred. . Interpretation of dreams about magic by relatives by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that magic is interpreted as scheming, deception, hypocrisy, corruption of the heart, lack of religion, disbelief, quackery, invalidity of work, vanity, conceit, deviation from nature, violation of the Sunnah, and following desires. Whoever sees sorcery among his relatives, it indicates that he seeks to He can separate him from his wife's house, spread a spirit of division between them, and can seduce husbands by word, deed, and behavior, and falsify facts to make them create. And whoever sees one of his family members bewitching him or his wife and children, then he is sowing discord among them, mixing truth with lies, insulting them, belittling their honor, and following them in gatherings. And if a person sees the veil of witchcraft, then it is clear that he is conspiring against him, grudges him, hides the facts from him, and misleads him from the eyes of others. The truth and keeps him away from the straight path. Interpretation of a dream about magic from relatives to single people. Magic in a dream symbolizes the entry of a man into her life, immersing her in her religious and worldly affairs, occupying her senses, and distracting her from her goals and hopes. If he sees magic from relatives, this indicates inactivity in work and the postponement of many projects. Delaying marriage and reversing the situation, especially if the magic is black. But if you see that it cancels the magic, this indicates the invalidation of the corrupt work, liberation from the evils of relatives, salvation from the pending, renewal of hopes, the disappearance of despair, and the completion of unfinished business. Projects.Interpretation of a dream about witchcraft by relatives for a married woman. Sorcery in her dream indicates someone who seduces her into her religion, sows doubt in her heart, and incites her against her husband. Sorcery from relatives is interpreted by someone who conspires against her, helps her, and destroys the tranquility of life. If she sees that her relatives have bewitched her, this indicates evil. The injustice that befell her, and the presence of someone trying to separate her from her husband and chase her, and if witchcraft was in bed, then this is evidence. The difference between her and the one she loves. If she sees a veil of magic in her home, this indicates turmoil, severe disagreements, successive crises, bitter ordeals, and...

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing cats in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Seeing cats in a dream for a single woman, interpreters believe that the dream carries a lot of news for the dreamer, but it also carries some warnings for her, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the meanings of a dream about kittens for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin and its interpretation by the great scholars. Seeing cats in a dream The single woman, according to Ibn Sirin, seeing kittens in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing kittens in a dream for a single woman indicates the presence of hypocrites in their environment and they should beware of them. The dream shows that she trusts someone who harms her and conspires against her, but she does not know that and believes that it is good, and the vision urges her to be careful with People at this time and do not trust anyone blindly. If the dreamer sees many white cats hovering around her in a dream, this means that someone is watching her and wants to enter her life and communicate with her, but he is a bad person and does not intend to do good to her. An indication of the presence of a man Ok, he has loved her for a long time and will propose to her soon, but if the cats are angry in her sleep, this leads to an imaginary feeling of anxiety about the future. Seeing cats in the dream of the single woman by Ibn Sirin. In the event that the cats attack the unmarried woman or try to harm her, the dream indicates her bad luck. And her lack of success in her life, especially if she did not kill the cats during the dream. This is an indication of the dreamer’s feeling of despair because of the presence of enemies in her life who are trying to discredit her. If she stays away from the cats in the dream, this indicates that she will be able to overcome the obstacles that stand in her way. It will reach its goals and occupy a high position in society in the near future. If the cats in the vision are scratched in the dream, this symbolizes that they will be harmed by their enemies, and the screaming of the cat in the vision indicates that they have been betrayed by a close friend. To get the correct interpretation, make a Search on Google, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site. The most important interpretations of seeing kittens in a dream for single women. Seeing kittens in a dream and being afraid of them for single women indicates that the dreamer feels afraid of a certain person who is trying to approach her and communicate with her, and she does not reciprocate his feelings and wants to get rid of him, and the dream indicates that The dreamer is an ambitious person and has big dreams for the future. She is trying with all her efforts to achieve her ambition despite the presence of many difficulties in her life. The vision symbolizes disobedience to her parents, so an unmarried woman must reconcile what exists between her and her parents. The dream symbolizes marriage to a difficult but wealthy man. Kind-hearted. Seeing angry cats in a dream: The vision symbolizes the presence of many problems in the dreamer’s life and that she is going through a major crisis from which she cannot get out. It also indicates her feeling of helplessness, hesitation, and inability to make her own decisions. Because the dreamer is a student, the dream indicates that she feels afraid of exams due to her failure in studying, and if an unmarried woman sees two angry cats in a dream, this indicates that her behavior is reckless and unbalanced and that she is unable to distinguish between right and wrong.

title: Interpretation of a dream about running in a cemetery in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about running in a cemetery in a dream Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about running in a cemetery in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about running in a cemetery in a dream Anyone who dreams that he is running in a cemetery can indicate the end of the worries and problems that the dreamer was facing at that time. A dream about running through a cemetery in a dream can indicate the good changes that are happening to the dreamer in his life in those days. It is possible that seeing running in a cemetery indicates some good changes and good coming to the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. If a person sees that he was running between the graves, this may indicate the abundance of sustenance that the dreamer would have obtained in his life in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running on the road in a dream Anyone who sees in his dream that he is running very quickly on the road, this may indicate his many skills and abilities to succeed. Running on the road in a dream can mean bearing a great responsibility thanks to God. If someone sees that he was running in a dream and does not know in which direction, this may indicate his fear of his future and cannot determine his goals. Running on the road in a dream is evidence of the great effort and energy that the dreamer has to achieve His dreams. Interpretation of a dream about running in the dark in a dream Seeing yourself running in the dark in a dream may indicate the dreamer's desire to isolate himself from others. Seeing him running in the dark in a dream may mean that he was feeling lonely at that time, and God knows best. If one sees that he was running in the dark, this may indicate the rejection of the negative feelings that the dreamer was going through at that time, and God knows best. If one sees that he is running in the dark, this may indicate the benefit he gets after the suffering that the dreamer endured in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running in the desert in a dream Running in the desert in a dream may indicate the presence of a large number of happy things in the dreamer's life at that time. If one sees that he was running in the desert, this may indicate the happy times that the dreamer went through at that time. Seeing running in the desert in a dream may indicate the happiness and joy that the dreamer experiences during this time, thanks to God. The dream of running in the desert in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is going through a difficult period in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running in an orchard in a dream Anyone who dreams of running in an orchard can indicate the dreamer's upcoming joys At that time. Falling into an unfamiliar orchard in a dream may indicate the confidence that the dreamer feels in those days. If one sees that he is in an orchard with someone, this may indicate the affection and mercy that exists between them. A person’s dream that he was running in an orchard in a dream may indicate his good social relationships, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream of running barefoot in a dream A person who sees that he is barefoot may indicate that he is going through a very big crisis at that time and needs to ask God for help. If he sees

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing sesame in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Seeing sesame in a dream has many good interpretations and good news, and its interpretation varies depending on the state of the sesame and the state of the monarch. It can indicate the marriage of single people, an abundance of food for the married woman, and the alleviation of her worries. And many other interpretations that we will learn through the following lines. Interpretation of sesame in a dream by Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of sesame in a dream. The interpretation of sesame in a dream carries many positive signs that bring comfort and peace to the soul, as it indicates the abundance of goodness and blessing in money and offspring. And whoever sees in his dream that He eats sesame, as this is evidence of good circumstances and a change in his life for the better. Most interpretive scholars believe that seeing sesame seeds in sesame seeds is a harbinger of goodness and abundant nutrition, while sesame oil is evidence of unhappiness and fruitless suffering. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of sesame in a dream According to Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Shaheen believes that the vision of acquiring sesame from another person symbolizes a close life that has an impact on the dreamer. Among his interpretations is that sesame indicates the abundance of money, popular trade, the fortuneteller’s fame and wealth, and his blessing on his wealth, which increases day after day. Contrary to the one who sees himself eating sesame. And he finds that it has a bad taste. This is evidence that he is exposed to some crises and difficulties in life, and it may affect his obtaining forbidden money or consuming his money. others unjustly.Read more: Interpretation of seeing someone you love many times in a dreamSee also: Seeing a promise in a dreamInterpretation of seeing sesame seeds in a dream according to Al-NabulsiAl-Nabulsi’s interpretations will differ from the interpretation of sesame in a dream, but most of them are positive and good interpretations, as seeing sesame in a dream is a sign of many The money that the visionary earns through halal means. And whoever sees in his dream that he is planting sesame, this is good news that he will get his own job and it will provide him with a lot of money and livelihood. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is eating sesame seeds and he was a doctor, this is evidence of his mastery of his work and his success. In him and his great fame in the world and his good reputation. And whoever sees himself in a dream anointing his body with sesame oil and gets sick, this is good news that he will recover, God willing, and he will be restored to health and strength again after he was sick and weak. While whoever dreams that he is collecting sesame seeds in a dish, this is good news. About a lot of food and soon hearing the good news. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of sesame in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Next, we will present to you the interpretation of sesame in a dream according to the scholar Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing sesame seeds in a dream is one of the visions Al-Mahmoudah, which promises a good abundance, an abundance of livelihood and good news. And for a single person who sees sesame in his dream and that he gets it from a beautiful girl, this is good news about his upcoming marriage to a good, kind and reliable girl. Read more: Interpretation of seeing going out without a veil in a dream. See also: Carrying a hand A friend in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sesame seeds in one dream. Seeing sesame seeds in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the signs

title: The 8 most famous interpretations of seeing the color pink in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the color pink in a dream? The components of ambition and the desire to achieve dreams. What does it mean to see the color pink in a single woman’s dream? It indicates the realism in which the girl lives. What is the interpretation of seeing buying pink shoes in a dream? Proof that the dreamer is a good person. Interpretation of seeing the color pink in a pregnant woman’s dream? An indicator of easy delivery. What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman wearing a pink dress? Evidence of good luck and good health. Interpretation of a dream about pink by Ibn Sirini. The color pink in a dream indicates ambition and the desire to achieve dreams. The color pink in... The dream leads to a happy life. So, seeing the color pink in a dream is good news and a praiseworthy vision for the dreamer. Buying pink shoes in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a good person. Interpretation of a dream about pink for a single woman: Seeing a girl in a dream wearing pink clothes is a sign of kindness. And love. Then, seeing a girl in a dream wearing a pink dress, this is a sign of good luck. The color pink appears in the dream of an unmarried woman. The reality in which the girl lives. Then, seeing a girl in a dream wearing pink shoes, this is an indication of her imminent marriage. Seeing the color Pink for a married woman: The color pink in a married woman’s dream indicates stability in married life. If a married woman sees that she is wearing a pink dress, this indicates the joy that will come to her soon. After that, seeing buying a pink dress in a married woman’s dream is a sign of pregnancy in the future. Nearby. When seeing a pink dress with an elegant appearance, this indicates protection and kindness. The pink color indicates the engagement of an unmarried girl and he will be a nice young man. Interpretation of a dream of pink for a man. Seeing the color pink in a man’s dream is a sign of kindness and change in his life. If a man sees that he is wearing Pink pants, this is an indication that he is connected to a beautiful girl. Then, if a man sees in a dream the walls of the house covered in pink, this is a sign of a happy marriage. If a man sees in a dream that his wife is wearing a pink dress, this is good news about pregnancy and hearing good news. Interpretation of a dream about the color pink for a pregnant woman: The color pink in a dream for a pregnant woman is a sign of the good health that she is in. Then, when seeing a pregnant woman in a dream, her face turned pink, and this indicates her good health throughout the pregnancy. Hence, seeing the color Pink in a pregnant woman's dream is a sign of easy birth. Pink in a pregnant woman's dream can be an indication of the birth of a girl. Hence, seeing a pregnant woman wearing a pink dress is a sign of good luck and a healthy baby.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a threesome according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a threesome Today, through the site Various, we will talk about the interpretation of a dream about a threesome. Scientists have generally interpreted the dream about sex as indicating status, prestige, and power. Some say that it shows the great benefit that the dreamer will obtain, but if the dreamer has witnessed the marriage of the parents, this indicates the presence of a large number, and God The Great One knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a three-way sexual relationship with friends. Scientists interpreted a dream about having sex with friends as an indication that if one of the friends does not refuse marriage, this is an indication of the great benefit that will be achieved. Interpretation of a dream about a three-way sexual relationship in a man’s dream. Scientists interpreted the symbol of a three-way sexual relationship in A man’s dream, which indicates that there are people who interfere in the affairs of his life and can cause many problems in his personal and professional life that will be destroyed because of them and loss of work if this relationship is familiar, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a three-way sexual relationship for a pregnant woman Some scholars interpreted it as a symbol To see a three-way sexual relationship in a pregnant woman’s dream. It is an unpleasant dream, because it indicates that the opinionated person will die soon. It also indicates the problems and fears that will be faced and could lead to the life of the fetus (miscarriage), and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about sexual relations with one’s sister. Scientists have adopted and interpreted the vision of sexual relations with one’s sister, a vision that brings a lot of goodness, and it is a good vision, because it shows the brother’s fear and protection. He is the one who defends her and controls everyone. It is the decisions, and it also states that the brother wants to marry her to a person with praiseworthy qualities. Interpretation of the dream of sexual relations with the mother. Many scholars have interpreted it as a dream of having sex with his mother in a dream, indicating that if the dreamer is traveling, this indicates the approaching date. Returning from travel. This indicates his recovery from the disease, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about sexual relations with a brother. Senior scholars interpreted the vision of creating an intimate sexual relationship. Some say it is a good vision, that is, an indication of the strength of the spiritual closeness between them, and indicates the strength of hiding secrets from each other. Some say it is unpleasant. Because it shows the problems and disagreements that will arise. And God knows best.Interpretation of watching pornographic films in a dream. Scientists interpreted watching pornographic films in a dream as an unpleasant vision because watching pornographic films in reality is prohibited by Sharia law, and seeing it in a dream indicates a strong opinion about this relationship and that it indicates disasters and that the dreamer follows proverbs. These dreams are in, and God Almighty knows best. Reasons for dreaming about sex. There are many reasons why you dream about sex, and we will talk about some of them: A great desire to have sex. The age period, that is, adolescence, due to the lack of proper awareness of the gender issue. Also because one of the spouses wants this relationship, but There is no aversion to the other party. The lack of sexual pleasure between the spouses due to the wife’s separation from her. And seeing a lot of sex in a dream is a reason for the dreamer to get out of his control and may commit sins and adultery, and God Almighty
